DOC.brief_title: Investigation Immuno-regulation Viral Hepatitis Among Patients With After Dengue Fever Infection
DOC.detailed_description: Research show CLEC5A interacts dengue virion directly , responsible dengue virus ( DV ) -induced DAP12 phosphorylation . Data suggest CLEC5A potential therapeutic target dengue hemorrhagic fever ( DHF ) /dengue shock syndrome ( DSS ) . This project study gene CLEC5A , Mannose receptor , DC-SIGN , NALP , decoy receptor 3 ( DcR3 ) , Toll-like receptor ( TLRs ) , ( Nod ) -like receptor ( NLRs ) DF DHF group . In addition , serum level decoy receptor 3 ( DcR3 ) test . The study collect blood sample 350 healthy person 350 person infect dengue fever .
